articles.author: Leafly Staff
articles.text:
Leafly’s Faves is a series providing a glimpse into the strains, products, and brands that our team of cannabis aficionados is buying, consuming, and enjoying the most every year. Some are entirely new to the market, while others are simply perennial favorites that we can’t recommend enough. Below, find our crew’s favorite cannabis strains of 2017. How many have you tried? What was your favorite strain of 2017? Share with us in the comments below!

Plushberry
An introspective indica that won’t put you to sleep, Plushberry is the perfect strain for enjoying some peace and quiet. Relax with the aroma of lavender wrapped up in this cross of two more of our faves: Space Queen and Black Cherry Soda.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Lemonder
For a light, euphoric strain that offers bright flavors of lemon and pine, track down the balanced Seattle-native hybrid Lemonder. A cross between Lavender, Super Lemon Haze, and OG Kush, we love its mentally stimulating qualities that don’t overwhelm.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
What Are You Smoking? Episode 18
The Top THC-Dominant Strains of Washington State in Fall 2017

Allen Wrench
A child of popular parents (Trainwreck and NYC Diesel), the sour sativa Allen Wrench packs a punch of upbeat energy. We love harnessing its powerful cerebral qualities and energy-boosting characteristics on busy days.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
6 Cannabis Strains to Help You Stay Productive
These Cannabis Strains All Have Unique Cannabinoids


Dutchberry
Ringing in at around 8% CBD and 27% THC, the giggle-inducing hybrid Dutchberry takes on the best attributes of its Dutch Treat and DJ Short Blueberry parents. A particularly delicious strain, we can’t get enough of the berry and citrus flavors that accompany this happy high.
Also featured in: Smoke This, Play That Vol. 4
Sunset Sherbet
The potent hybrid Sunset Sherbet is a powerful, full-body strain that will take you to new heights with its cerebral stimulation. We’ve been filling our bongs with a hefty dose to melt away stress and bask in a richly euphoric high.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer
Top Trending Strains of 2015
Tips for Growing Sunset Sherbet Cannabis

Dark Side of the Moon
Inspired by the famous Pink Floyd album, Dark Side of The Moon is a sweet indica that we like to reserve for right before bedtime. For the perfect nightcap after a stressful day, we recommend packing your favorite pipe and slipping into an elevated slumber.
Also featured in: May the Fourth Be With You: The Best Strains to Celebrate the Galactic Star Wars Holiday

Space Queen
With sweet dessert aromas including notes of vanilla, cherry, and apple, the hybrid Space Queen helped us stay upbeat in 2017. Perfect for daytime use, Space Queen’s sativa qualities deliver a buzzy kick that will keep you going (despite its indica Romulan roots).
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Celebrate 10 Famous 4/20 Birthdays With These Strain Pairings
Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With your Zodiac Sign?
7 ‘Eye Candy’ Movies to Pair With Your Favorite Strain

White Tahoe Cookies
The strong indica that is White Tahoe Cookies was practically made for lazy days. With sedative effects that build with each hit, you’ll want to park somewhere comfortable and clear your schedule for a cozy day in (we’ve found White Tahoe Cookies to be very hyggelig).
Harlequin
The CBD-rich sativa Harlequin delivers a stress-melting 5:2 CBD:THC ratio that expertly crushes anxiety and pain without the intoxicating effects. A Columbia Gold and Swiss landrace descendant, Harlequin is a preferred strain for those among us who are medical patients as well as the many of us who simply love CBD.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
Tips for Growing Harlequin Cannabis
7 High-Energy Strains to Help You Get Active and Fight Fatigue
High CBD Products for Medical Marijuana Patients
What Are the Best Cannabis Stains for Pain?


Dancehall
Suitable for social gatherings and celebratory occasions, the hybrid Dancehall is an aptly named energy-boosting strain. We’ve been loading up our vaporizers before concerts, parties, festivals, and all manner of exciting events.
Also featured in:

The 100 Cannabis Strains You Must Try Before You Die
11 Unsung Cannabis Strains Worth Discovering

Purple Trainwreck
Born from the powerhouse combination of Trainwreck and Mendocino Purps, hybrid Purple Trainwreck is the go-to strain for laughing fits and cerebral stimulation. We’ve been keeping it on hand for its tasty notes of pine, lavender, and citrus.
Also featured in:

Tips for Growing Purple Trainwreck Cannabis
10 Products to Pick Up Before 4/20
The 10 Cannabis Strains You Must Try This Summer

Lead image by Julia Sumpter/Leafly
articles.title: Leafly's Faves 2017: Strains

articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Looking for a good indica to kick back with this weekend? Or maybe an uplifting sativa to keep you busy? Check out all of our newly added strains and see if they're available near you by clicking the links below!
 
 Bubblicious

Bubblicious (not to be confused with Wonka’s Bubblicious) is Nirvana Seeds’ rendition of the classic Indiana Bubble Gum. Refined in the Netherlands since the 1990s, Bubblicious captures the signature bubble gum flavor that first lent this hybrid widespread notoriety. Sometimes, Bubblicious will even take on a pink hue that further justifies the naming of this sweet-smelling hybrid. Potent and relaxing, Bubblicious offers full-body effects that soothe tension and stress even in seasoned THC veterans.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Bubblicious
 
 Dark Side of the Moon

From Exotic Genetix comes Dark Side of the Moon, an indica strain that pays homage to the legendary 1973 Pink Floyd album. A cross between Spirit in the Sky and Green Ribbon, Dark Side of the Moon flowers bloom with a starry coat of crystal trichomes wreathed by dark purple leaves, giving the strain an almost celestial appearance. Earthy, hashy flavors lead the way with full, sweet fruity notes to follow.

 
 Poochie Love

Poochie Love from Archive Seed Bank is a 70% sativa strain that descends from the ever-so-tasteful Dog Shit and Face Off OG. The Dog Shit parent is famous for its, um, “novel” smell that gave this strain its name, but Poochie Love came out smelling a bit more like earthy and herbal spice. Where Poochie Love really shines, however, is in its powerful but motivating euphoria. Stimulating creative and social energy, Poochie Love is the perfect companion strain for busy days in which a functional mind is paramount.

 
 Omega

Bred over generations from White Widow, Kush, NYC Diesel, and Permafrost genetics, Omega by Rogue Buds is a hybrid strain that lets the mind soar while relaxing the body. This high-THC strain carries a pungent and complex aroma comprised of earthy pine, sweet citrus, and spicy menthol notes. Omega eases muscle tension and frees the head space of excessive stress, making this strain a perfect partner for winding down after a long day.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Omega
 
 Gobbilygoo

Gobbilygoo is an indica strain bred by Alphakronik, who combines genetics from Blue Magoo and Gobbstopper (a Purple Urkle and Sin City Kush hybrid). With a sweet flavor of blueberries and grapes, Gobbilygoo delivers deeply relaxing effects that keep both mind and body heavily pacified. Designed for growers in the Pacific Northwest, Gobbilygoo is highly resistant to mildew and flowers in 50 to 55 days.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Gobbilygoo
 
 Purple Cow

Purple Cow is a sativa cannabis strain bred from parents Flo and Dairy Queen. She primarily inherits sativa qualities, passing on uplifting cerebral effects to the consumer. Creative minds will appreciate the extra spark provided by Purple Cow’s dreamy, invigorating euphoria, and her sweet, sour mango aroma has something to offer flavor connoisseurs as well. Purple Cow buds explode with chunky, resin-packed calyxes which can take on a slight purple hue at the end of her maturation cycle.

 
 Mandala #1

Bred by Mandala Seeds, Mandala #1 is a hybrid strain with genetic roots in South Africa, New Zealand, and Northern India. Dreamy euphoria illuminates the mind, waking creativity and happiness with a sweet fragrance of apples, raspberry, and mint. Mandala #1 may hit like a sativa, but to the delight of commercial growers, it grows like an indica with a short flowering cycle of just 55 to 60 days.

Click here for a full list of locations currently carrying Mandala #1
 
Browse through our other new strains that were recently added to the Leafly Explorer, or check out last week's newest additions!
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Poochie Love, Dark Side of the Moon, Omega, and More

Earthy, hashy flavors lead the way with full, sweet fruity notes to follow.
descriptionPlain: From Exotic Genetix comes Dark Side of the Moon, an indica strain that pays homage to the legendary 1973 Pink Floyd album. A cross between Spirit in the Sky and Green Ribbon, Dark Side of the Moon flowers bloom with a starry coat of crystal trichomes wreathed by dark purple leaves, giving the strain an almost celestial appearance. Earthy, hashy flavors lead the way with full, sweet fruity notes to follow.

highlightedReviews.text:
I've never seen a bud so purple before!  This Indica smells smooth with a slightly sweet tang.  Very smooth smoke, and the effects hit you instantly.  Half a joint and I was out cold, happily drifting off to sleep.  Should be called "Goodnight Mr. Moon". 

Great for anxiety ♥️
Takes me into a dreamy state that may or may not lead to sleep.

name: Dark Side of the Moon
